0010110000010111 0110100011111000 1 -> sum: 1001010100010000, cout: 0
1110100011100111 0101100001100010 1 -> sum: 0100000101001010, cout: 1
1001110100011100 0011010111001001 0 -> sum: 1101001011100101, cout: 0
0001000100010011 0110100010011101 0 -> sum: 0111100110110000, cout: 0
1111011100101001 1010010011011011 1 -> sum: 1001110000000101, cout: 1
